data.name: Snacky Tower
data.detailed_description:
What a horrible night to have a curse! You have only 100 steps to reach the top of Snacky Tower and to defeat the evil Salt Lord. Every step changes your form, but you can only defeat enemies in the right one. To use the least amount of steps, while trying to reach the next floor, you need to plan carefully – or get help.



Save Babyccinos to regain steps. Meet the Banker to save your gold. Use the environment to your advantage and save steps. The Shopkeeper in Endless Mode is always keen for a round of cards; expand your deck by beating Standard Mode to reach unimagined heights.

Features

  • High replayability through randomly generated floors
  • Think ahead and love it when your plan comes together
  • No pressure! Solve each room at your own pace
  • Use gold to buy permanent upgrades
  • Win playing cards in Standard Mode to make your journey in Endless Mode easier

data.short_description: Defeat enemies in a rock-paper-scissors style combat to clear every room. Your steps are limited, so plan carefully and puzzle your way to the top of Snacky Tower! Use gold to increase your chances to win or beat your highscore in endless mode.
